meanings.definition: Used to refer to people or things that are physically distant from the speaker and the listener.
meanings.sent1: In the distance, I could see those tall trees swaying in the wind.
meanings.sent2: Can you pass me those books on the top shelf?
meanings.sent3: I tried to catch those runaway balloons, but they were too fast!
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared high like those birds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The howling wind carried the sound of those distant church bells.

meanings.definition: Used to refer to people or things that have already been mentioned or are easily identified.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I saw a cat in the garden. Those whiskers were so fluffy!
meanings.sent2: I love those cookies you baked last time.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe I forgot to bring those important documents to the meeting!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, just like those joyful memories.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread always reminds me of those cozy mornings.
